main.name: Mark Lin
main.description: I am a 3A Honours Mathematics Student, majoring in Statistics at the University of Waterloo
main.bio: I love music, reading and (obviously) coding. I excel at front-end frameworks like React.js and Angular.js and have back-end experience with Ruby on Rails, AWS, GraphQL, Firebase and Java/Scala. I am currently looking for an internship for Summer 2023.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Amount of professional experience with each language.

education.description: Part of the co-op program offered at the University of Waterloo. I am currently looking for an opportunity for my fourth co-op term.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on the Drop Mobile app using React Native, Ruby on Rails and AWS. Aided in the development of pets, developed our internal REST API, and took ownership of a project which lead to an increase in shop engagement.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on the Transparency Trader team, and helped develop and manage a FO risk management tool for fixed income and FX. Worked with Angular and Scala to create multiple support tools which fetch data and provides it to the user either in browser or in an excel document. I also increased performance on all projects by identifying hardware issues through Java scripts that parsed data from log files.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Created a dynamic and responsive web application using Typescript, React.js, Next.js and Firebase. I redesigned the entire website, refactored our RESTful APIs and architected the backend in Firebase.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Created an optimized smart contract for a decentralized application on the Ethereum blockchain where users can pool their ether to earn the chance of increasing profits using Solidity and Node.js.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template
